text:
Engage | Web Developer - Full Stack (PHP and WordPress) | Alexandria, VA | Onsite | Fulltime | https://enga.ge/

Engage is a full-service digital agency based in Alexandria, VA, right outside of Washington, DC. We are 20 full-time employees that build digital solutions for our clients who range from non-profits to fortune 500 companies. Our creative team designs and implements stunning websites and we need a developer to help us solve complex challenges, typically using WordPress/PHP.

Read the full job description and apply here: https://engagedc.theresumator.com/apply/pjtER7dRfx
